title.value: Data Standards Wales WRRS Task Type

description.value: A set of task type codes for the Welsh Result Reporting Service (WRRS)

definition.value: A request to acknowledge a personal notification for a completed diagnostic test report generated by the WRRS system. A pesonal notification is sent to the test requestor, or has been forwarded by another clinical user.
A request to acknowledge a general notification for a completed diagnostic test report generated by the WRRS system.
